episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Resilient Rural Futures
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Resilient Rural Futures.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [Toms Guide] Experts explain why over 65s need this amount of sleep — and how to get it and [ScienceAlert] There's a Critical Thing You Can Do to Keep Alzheimer's Symptoms at Bay, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive on Resilient Rural Futures Topics include: broadband, AI, infrastructure, maintenance, funding.

Hosts: Riley (Tech optimist with an engineering background) and Casey (Community-first skeptic of tech promises).
